item.title: Application config management: Lightweight but enterprise-ready
item.description:
Description

Learn how to leverage dynaconf + flask to handle web-application configs in an elegant way. And be nimble for lightweight application deployment, but easily rise to enterprise grade management with secret management, configuration web interfaces, user specific configurations, validators, and more!
item.dc:creator: Abdeali Kothari

item.title: Don't think about settings, use Dynaconf
item.description:
Description

In this talk, Bruno will show you how to use Dynaconf to manage your settings in Flask.
item.dc:creator: Bruno Rocha
